plot: Based on Oskar Kokoschka's play, 'The Burning Bush' is a visual poem that explores the arc of a passionate love affair. Beautifully shot with a diverse international cast and original music by renowned composer Nicolas Economou.
title: The Burning Bush
plot_es: Based on Oskar Kokoschka's play, 'The Burning Bush' is a visual poem that explores the arc of a passionate love affair. Beautifully shot with a diverse international cast and original music by renowned composer Nicolas Economou.
plot_en: Based on Oskar Kokoschka's play, 'The Burning Bush' is a visual poem that explores the arc of a passionate love affair. Beautifully shot with a diverse international cast and original music by renowned composer Nicolas Economou.
